import React, { Component } from 'react'; import NavBar from "../components/NavBar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; // import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; // import InputRange from 'react-input-range' import PriceRange from '../components/PriceRange'; import axios from '../axios'; import MainContent from "../components/MainContent"; export default class ShopScreen extends Component { state = { mers: [], totalPage : "", page : 1, pageSize : 16 }; componentDidMount() { axios .get("/api/merchandise" + this.props.location.search) .then(data => { console.log(data.data.data); this.setState({ mers: data.data.data }); console.log(this.state.mers); }) .catch(error => console.log(error)); } componentDidMount() { axios .get(`/api/merchandise?page=${this.state.page}&pageSize=${this.state.pageSize}`) .then(data => { console.log(data); }) } render() { return (
